allow: Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/memory/save -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""userId"": ""user_123"", ""sessionId"": ""session_456"", ""content"": ""User prefers dark mode"", ""importance"": 0.8}')

Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/memory/recall -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""userId"": ""user_123"", ""query"": ""dark mode preference"", ""sessionId"": ""session_456"", ""limit"": 10}')
